comments: Her portrait photo appears in Orchid Review 80: 69 (1972). Responsible for lists in Orchid Review 68(808) Oct. 1960 to 80(946) April 1972 and hence editor and/or author of the new orchid hybrid genera that were published during that period.
examples: x Onoara Wreford in Orchid Rev. 75(890, cppo): 3. 1967.
